scripts.dev-both: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace frontend" "npm run dev --workspace backend"
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:shared
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:frontend-full
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.rebuild:frontend: npm run clean:frontend && npm run build
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace frontend && npm run lint --workspace backend
scripts.lint-fix: npm run lint-fix --workspace frontend && npm run lint-fix --workspace backend
scripts.prettify: npm run prettify --workspace frontend && npm run prettify --workspace backend
